data.text: @OfficialSASSA @The_DSD @nda_rsa @GCISMedia @PostofficeSa @GovernmentZA As a mother of two kids I have battled alot with my financial state to the point of begging from friends just to survive,until I started Bitcoin trading with the help of @cynthianeliwe made a successful withdrawal of R 200,000 with the help of @cynthianeliwe
